summary: Benji sniffs out a bogus CIA agent in Athens, Greece.
cast: Benjean|Art Vasil|Allen Fiuzat|Patsy Garrett|Cynthia Smith|Ed Nelson|Catherine McClenry|Anassis Vassilakidis|Dean Goss|Tony Alatis|Kostas Kleftogiannis|Michalis Lambrinos|Peter Bowles|Bridget Armstrong|Valerios Megaloikonomov|Giorgos Tzifos|Giannis Kondoulis|Yannis Totsikas|Vagelis Traiforos|Giorgos Velentzas|Brandon Camp|Brandon Cunningham|Savas Alatis|Gary Grubbs|Angela Cacoliris Samaras
title: Por el amor de Benji
